label: Wizard U 10
description:
Hubert makes his way to the trophy room, and notices a display case that had previously housed a quicksilver scepter, was now empty, with no signs of tampering.
After examining the case, Hubert is able to discern there was some magic use, but not to what extent until he does a closer examination.
Hubert tries a ward reveal spell.

Hit 1 for Sight.
Hit 2 for Sound
Hit 3 for Touch.
Hit 4 for Taste.
Hit 5 for Smell.

Hit 0 to quit.
